text: Saudia ( ), formerly known as Saudi Arabian Airlines ( ) is the flag carrier and largest airline of Saudi Arabia, based in Jeddah. It was started in 1945 with the help of the United States government. TWA managed the airline until the 1960s. The airline joined SkyTeam in May 2012. As of 2024, Saudia goes to more then 95 cities worldwide. ==Gallery== File:Boeing 747-2B4BM, Saudia - Saudi Arabian Airlines (Middle East Airlines - MEA) AN0586300.jpg|A Saudia Boeing 747 in 1979. File:Saudia.jpg|A Airbus A320 with the Saudi Arabian titles.
